short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WowTab is a highly customizable new tab extension focused on efficiency enhancement, created by Microsoft.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ“£Here is Mircrosoft WowTab--Your personalized New Tab Page!
Mircrosoft WowTab is dedicated to offering you a new tab page experience that is clean, beautiful, ad-free, and highly customizable.


ğŸ¥°Why Choose Microsoft WowTab?
â¤ Offering multiple modes for diverse experiences, easily switch between Regular Mode and Calm Mode with just one click.
â¤ A wide array of widgets is at your disposal, including efficiency and daily widgets, among others.
â¤ Add a multitude of websites effortlessly with just one click â€“ it's a piece of cake!
â¤ The Bing Daily Wallpaper feature ensures that you are welcomed with a new and stunning wallpaper every day to brighten your day.
â¤ Customize your wallpaper by uploading your favorite images.
â¤ Choose freely from an extensive wallpaper library.
â¤ Wallpaper Download
â¤ High Customization
â¤ Calm Mode provides a personal space for you to regain inner peace.


ğŸ‘Find out more on the official website
Microsoft WowTab: https://wowtab.microsoft.com/en

ğŸ“ªFeel free to give us feedback
Discord: https://discord.gg/vnbVAWCF97
